item.title: %%%%Need help with HP Problem%%%%
item.dc:creator: @Joachim2k1k Joachim2k1k
item.description:
@Joachim2k1k wrote:

[code=java] for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { //Setting player items
playerItems[i] = 0;
}
for (int i = 0; i<playerItemsN.length; i++) { //Setting Item amounts
playerItemsN[i] = 0;
}

	for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
		if (i == 3) {
			playerLevel[i] = 99;
			playerXP[i] = 14000000;
		} else {
			playerLevel[i] = 1;
			playerXP[i] = 0;
		}
	}

	for (int i = 0; i< playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank items
		bankItems[i] = 0;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank item amounts
		bankItemsN[i] = 0;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
		playerEquipment[i] = -1;
		playerEquipmentN[i] = 0;
	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: %%%%Need help with HP Problem%%%%

item.description:
@nemo296 wrote:

[code] for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { //Setting player items
playerItems[i] = 0;
}
for (int i = 0; i<playerItemsN.length; i++) { //Setting Item amounts
playerItemsN[i] = 0;
}

	for (int i=0; i<playerLevel.length; i++) { //Setting Levels
		if (i == 3) {
			playerLevel[i] = 99;
			playerXP[i] = 1155;
		} else {
			playerLevel[i] = 1;
			playerXP[i] = 0;
		}
	}

	for (int i = 0; i< playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank items
		bankItems[i] = 0;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) { //Setting bank item amounts
		bankItemsN[i] = 0;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < playerEquipment.length; i++) {
		playerEquipment[i] = -1;
		playerEquipmentN[i] = 0;
	}[/code]
